name: Root Walker
description:
Hello! This is a prototype I made for the Go Godot Jam. Prototype because the game is not complete (the levels  story and characters are missing and as you can see the gameplay is still quite rudimentary). It was also my very first game. 

If you're interested by what I'll create in the future, or would like to see more of this game in particular, you can follow me on Twitter , at @mxhelianthe.

Thank you for taking the time to play my little game, and to read my text! Have a great day!
